name: Debnoli (V)
Lore: 'Good-natured patron of Mos Eisley cantina, until the Empire impounded his starship. Expert marksman. Seeking revenge on the Empire.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While with an Imperial, you may initiate battle here for free. Permanent weapon is blaster rifle (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).',
